name: astroserverpackage
description: Package for running the astroweb server

scripts.firstBuild: git clone https://github.com/SustainRelease/Revolt && cd Revolt && npm install && cd .. && git clone https://github.com/SustainRelease/Astroweb	&& cd Astroweb && npm install && sudo node ./admin/shell/projectReset.js cd .. && git pull && npm install
scripts.update: cd Astroweb && git pull && npm install && cd .. && cd Revolt && git pull && npm install && cd .. && git pull && npm install
scripts.start: sudo service mongod start && sudo service nginx start && pm2 start bin/build.js
scripts.restart: sudo service nginx restart && pm2 delete build && pm2 start bin/build.js

author: Robbie Muir
